I am a front-end developer based in Tübi: I am a front-end developer based in Tübingen, Germany with experience in building web apps using JavaScript & Angular. My journey in IT began many years ago during my studies when I started to write simple add-on programs using Python in order to analyze spatial data using graphical information systems.
That experience sparked my interest in t: That experience sparked my interest in the field, and my passion for programming has never faded. Since then, I have continued to dive deeper into the world of technology and have explored variousprogramming languages and tools. Close contact with my father-in-law, a self-taught and experiencedweb developer, has also fed my enthusiasm to become a developer myself and given me important insights into the world of professional development.
In October 2022, I finally decided to tu: In October 2022, I finally decided to turn professional and started an online coding seminar at the Developer Akademie, a professional coding school based in Munich. It has been an incredible journey thus far, filled with challenges, learning, and growth. Now, I am looking forward to starting my career in IT!
Contact me through this form, I am inter: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
I have been able to grow my developement: I have been able to grow my developement skills while creating various real projects. Have a look!
This page is a sample of my work - Pleas: This page is a sample of my work - Please feel free to try them out.
join_explanation: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
elpolloloco_explanation: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and poison bottles to fight against el pollo loco.
ringoffire_explanation: A small online card game inspired by the popular drinking card game, that works on multiple devices.
pokedex_explanation: Based on the PokeAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
